body: The current rust bot is called `homu`: valid commands are http://buildbot.rust-lang.org/homu/ ;  Because Rust uses GitHub PRs for all code review, homu provides some of the features that Go gets via Gerrit, OWNERS file,  and the current Trybot infrastructure.  That's from a purely technical perspective.  The talk also covers how having bots handle mundane tasks and also be personified has created a welcoming community in Rust.  That part is trickier to summarize.
